description: The unfortunate reality is that most books and videos we find on the internet either tell us what a creative genius did or discuss the science of creativity. The worlds greatest Innovators, Leaders and Entrepreneurs have shown the world the importance of creativity and thousands of Universities around the world have explained it's theoretical underpinnings .......................................................................................................... But, when do professionals actually get to practice growing their creative genius...and how do they learn the practices that actually work? In this 40 minute class you will participate in an activity, in the comfort of your home, that can and should be practiced daily, guaranteed to create new neural networks in your brain and enhance your creativity .......................................................................................................... The impact of this work is priceless and the investment in yourself, your mind, and your new venture is much needed. Join us today for 40 minutes as we grow our creativity, enhance our thinking and create dynamic ideas for the world. See you in class!
title: Grow Your Creativity... Grow Your Business
